title: Oven Data

processTable.clickToViewChart: Click a process row to display its temperature data on the chart below.

pasteDialog.invalidHydraBatch: Invalid HYDRA Batch format (must be 10 characters)

Paste your article values here (5 digits), for example:

30112
30113

Paste your HYDRA Batch values here (10 characters), for example:
HH12345678
AB98765432
XY11223344

temperatureChart.title: Temperature Trend
temperatureChart.selectProcess: Select a process from the table above to view its temperature data.
temperatureChart.noDataAvailable: No temperature data available for this process
temperatureChart.noDataFound: No temperature data found for this process
temperatureChart.deviationAlert: measurement deviated significantly from expected patterns and has been marked with an orange dot on the chart.
temperatureChart.deviationAlertPlural: measurements deviated significantly from expected patterns and have been marked with orange dots on the chart.
